short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the web quickly using the Searcut New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Searcut - Your Ultimate New Tab Extension!

Searcut is a powerful and versatile browser extension designed to enhance your online New Tab experience like never before. 

Key Features:

    Privacy and Security: Searcut values your privacy. It ensures that all search queries are securely transmitted to the respective search engines, safeguarding your personal information.

    Universal Compatibility: Searcut works seamlessly with all Chromium-based browsers, including Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Brave and Opera. 

    Regular Updates: The Searcut development team is committed to providing a seamless experience and will continuously update the extension to accommodate new features that enhance your productivity.

Unleash the full potential of your browsing experience with Searcut. Empower yourself to explore the web like never before. Download Searcut now and unlock a world of browsing convenience and productivity!


*************
Please note:  The New Tab's default search provider is set to Yahoo! Search.
Homepage: https://searcut.com/
Terms of Service: https://searcut.com/legal/terms.html
Privacy Policy:  https://searcut.com/legal/privacy.html
